overview: Eggwood, the Easter egg capital of the world, scrambles for a way to get all of the eggs ready for Easter after the Uglyunks invade the town and waste all of Eggwood's electricity! Without electricity, the rabbits of Eggwood are helpless! Sunny the porcupine invents a plan that will get Easter egg production hopping again... but will the town believe him?
tagline: A heartwarming adventure. A musical classic.
title: Sunshine Porcupine
